title: Integrated Farm Planning
text: Soil nutrient assessment. I feed the cows and make sure they have clean water. We plan the day: planting, irrigation, and equipment checks. Veterinary biosecurity keeps the herd healthy. The tractor starts slowly; I drive carefully on the farm road. The greenhouse helps control temperature and humidity. We assess soil nutrients to optimize fertilization plans. I work on Green Valley Farm, and every day is busy. In the morning, I wake up early and walk to the fields. Irrigation is scheduled to reduce water waste. Farm safety rules are part of our routine.
